EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation for Webinar: Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Registration Confirmation Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD
This is your confirmation that you are registered for the complimentary webinar "Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD." In this webinar you will discover:
Why Fusion ePCR was selected as a JEMS Hot Product The benefits and features of Fusion ePCR The data elements being transferred from Fusion ePCR to VisiCAD The Fusion ePCR / VisiCAD integration in action
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/ccmrrvb
DATE: Wednesday, October 26
TIME: 1 PM Eastern | Noon Central | 11 AM Mountain | 10 AM Pacific
PRESENTER: TriTech's Charlie Barry, Sr. Product Manager of Fusion ePCR
AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial the toll free number on your screen when you login
Trouble Logging In? Call 800.799.4510 for the iLinc Support Team Help
Questions? Jenny Clavero in TriTech Marketing (858) 799-7362 jenny.clavero@tritech.coom
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
